definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: A test bench for electronic unit pump(EUP) fuel injection system was designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了电控组合单体泵燃油喷射系统试验台。

sentences.english: The main task of Electronic Fuel Injection System is to control the fuel injection quantity.
sentences.chinese: 电控燃油喷射系统的主要任务是控制喷油量。

sentences.english: E. S. P Electrical Control equipments, Used to clear industrial fume.
sentences.chinese: 电除尘器配套电控设备，用于工业烟气的净化。

sentences.english: And then suddenly an electric control panel occured from behind a tree.
sentences.chinese: 然而，某一棵树的后面会突然冒出个电控面板来。

sentences.english: Three types and their properties of gas valves of electronic control automobile engine are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电控发动机节气门体的三种类型及特点。

sentences.english: For the first time, two types of single layer broadband reflective polarizers having electrically adjustable spectra are reported.
sentences.chinese: 首次报道了两类电控光谱单层宽带反射式偏振器。

sentences.english: Compact electric design, easy for maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 简洁电控箱设计，维修容易。

sentences.english: Equipped with electronic safety protection, ensure safe operation.
sentences.chinese: 设有电控安全保护装置，确保操作安全。

sentences.english: Noise jamming for electric control system of packaging machinery is very harmful.
sentences.chinese: 噪声干扰对于包装机械电控系统的危害很大。

sentences.english: The utility model is suitable for the electric vehicle hydraulic power steering pump.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型适用于可电控汽车液压转向助力泵。

sentences.english: If pump, base plate and controls are supplied, the units is made up.
sentences.chinese: 还可配套泵，公共底座，电控箱形成压力水柜单元。

sentences.english: Electrical isolation design, operation, and maintenance of absolute safety.
sentences.chinese: 电控箱隔离式设计，操作和保养绝对安全。

sentences.english: This kind of design will enlighten the design of other kinds of electric cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 此类设计对其它机器电控箱的设计也是一个启发。

sentences.english: Ensure the relays in electric cabinet are tight and in good contact.
sentences.chinese: 电控箱内各个继电器应无松动，接触良好。

sentences.english: The electro-controlled and the cooling setups in a vacuum unit are designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了真空机组的电控装置和循环水冷却装置。

sentences.english: In this paper, a single-chip microprocessor controlled MPI system is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种单片机控制的多点电控汽油喷射系统。
